availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas John Chesnutt (Franklin County soldier and clerk)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, soldier and clerk. Native of Norwich, Norfolk County, England. Married to Euphemia Eldridge Chesnutt. Father of Effie E. Chesnutt, Thomas John N. Chesnutt, Mary Alice Chesnutt, and Charles E. Chesnutt. School teacher in Franklin County in 1850. Clerk in Franklin County in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private during the Mexican-American War.
